title: Notice to the department of land and natural resources of suspensions and revocations of operating privileges
context: [ยง291E-50] Notice to the department of land and natural resources of suspensions and revocations of operating privileges. The director shall notify the department of land and natural resources of all persons adjudicated of violations under this part and the period of suspension or revocation of operator privileges ordered by the director under this part. [L 2001, c 157, pt of ยง3]
